body.name: North Woods Survival: A Wilderness Adventure Thriller (North Woods Survival Series)

body.description: North Wood Survival: Book 1 of 3When Hatchet and My Side of the Mountain collide, an offspring is born: NORTH WOODS SURVIVAL★ A heart-pounding story of survival in the unforgiving wilderness.★ Beautifully illustrated and a must read for those who are fans of wilderness survival!!A teenage boy becomes stranded in the remote woodlands of Northern Canada after his bush plane crashes and he is left as the sole survivor. With next to nothing, except the clothes on his back and a few items found from the crash site, he struggles to survive. He faces many dangers, but the biggest danger, one far greater than starvation, hypothermia or the threat of predators, is the danger he never sees coming until it’s almost too lateTake a ride on this epic journey of survival—a fictional account of a young man’s will to survive and make it out alive. Finding water, building a shelter, securing food, fighting off predators, battling the elements, while trying to navigate his way out, pushes him to his mental limits.★ ★ ★ ★ ★ ★Read about:✓ Starting a fire (using batteries and tinfoil)✓ Pine resin and its medicinal and practical uses✓ Making a signal mirror✓ How to tell how much time is left in the day using only your hands✓ Building an indigenous fishing trap✓ Shelter building techniques✓ Land and water navigation techniques✓ And much, much, more…--North Woods Survival SeriesBook 1: North Woods SurvivalBook 2: Train to NowhereBook 3: Lost River

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, quick read!
reviews.reviewText: This book is a real page-turner packed with adventure. The detailed writing pulls you in from page one and makes the action feel super realistic. Despite the detailed writing, the story moves quickly and will leave you wanting more. This is the perfect book for anyone who likes thrillers or adventure stories. It is also a great read for anyone looking to learn more about wilderness survival.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Survival and what I learned
reviews.reviewText: I loved everything about this book. It had suspence and intrigue. It shows a willingness to learning to adapt to changes and how to overcome problems. To not just live,but to survive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The whole experience seems so real
reviews.reviewText: Let me just say I finished this book in 1 day. It was that good. The way it is written is so detailed, it's like you were there experiencing all the fear and pain with Sam. Also this books make me terrified of going into small planes and reminded me that I need to refresh my survival skills. This is the best one yet.Give it a read.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great survival tale
reviews.reviewText: This was a great book, the attention to detail in all situations from the plane crash to details about the surroundings at the lake and on the river. Sam was lucky many times, and the anticipation of what will happen next keeps you glued to the story.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars quick easy read
reviews.reviewText: I liked the story and the character but there wasn’t enough depth or elaboration on anything. Could use another 100 pages of details and character growth without even needing to add more plot elements

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing wilderness survival thriller!
reviews.reviewText: If you’re looking for a good wilderness survival thriller, you found the right book. The wolf and bear scenes were a bit scary for my eleven-year-old son to read including the beginning chapter with the plane crash, but he never put it down. Now he wants to go camping in the woods. The problem is, I don’t camp!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A harrowing tale
reviews.reviewText: This was a harrowing tale of survival and adventure that kept me turning the pages to see what happens next. The pace of the story and the obstacles the characters face kept me hooked until the very end. Great read!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great wilderness survival adventure story
reviews.reviewText: The writing is simple and the book is short, but it is a good tale of a boy learning to survive in the woods with very little. Great wilderness survival adventure story!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great survival story in the wild....
reviews.reviewText: North Woods Survival is a great adventure story. It is more of an educational book to learn survival skills which are very helpful in the wild. Overall good read.
